Etsy285PointSystem.description: Complete 285-point Etsy listing optimization scoring system based on Etsy's 2025 algorithm

algorithmRankingFactors.boost: US domestic under $6 gets ranking boost

algorithmRankingFactors.note: AI matches listings to individual buyer behavior

rules.rule: Buyer intent phrases (e.g., 'gift for mom', 'personalized wedding')
Multi-word keyword phrases vs single words

criticalRules: Front-load with primary keyword while staying readable
Use buyer intent language, not just product descriptors
No keyword stuffing (algorithm penalizes in 2025)
Multi-word phrases perform better than single words

examples.bad: Print Art Wall Decor Poster Modern Minimalist Design Digital Download
examples.good: Modern Minimalist Wall Art Print | Scandinavian Bedroom Decor | Instant Download Printable Poster

criticalRules: Categories/attributes auto-populate as tags - don't waste slots repeating
Use long-tail variations (e.g., 'boho nursery wall art' not just 'wall art')
Vary keywords across listings - identical terms dilute effectiveness
First 160 characters appear in search snippets
Answer buyer questions preemptively
Natural keyword integration - avoid stuffing
Highlight benefits and use cases, not just materials

rules.rule: First thumbnail optimized for mobile feed

criticalRules: Minimum 2000 pixels width REQUIRED
5+ photos strongly recommended
NO collages or text overlays - algorithm deprioritizes
First thumbnail CRITICAL for CTR in mobile feed (44%+ mobile traffic)
imageStrategy: First image: Eye-catching thumbnail for mobile feed
Images 2-4: Multiple angles and detail close-ups
Images 5-7: Lifestyle context showing product in use

criticalRules: Complete ALL attribute fields - unlocks filter-based discovery
Attributes auto-generate as tags - expands keyword reach
US domestic shipping under $6 = ranking boost (October 2024 update)
Free shipping preferred over low-cost by algorithm
Return policy REQUIRED on all listings

targets.note: Each sale signals relevance, boosting future rankings

criticalRules: Response time <24 hours CRITICAL (measured over 3 months)
On-time shipping tracked - late shipments harm rankings
Shop-level metrics affect ALL listings

criticalDos: Maintain shipping costs under $6 for US domestic orders
Upload 5+ professional photos, minimum 2000px width, NO text/collages
Respond to messages within 24 hours consistently
Front-load titles with primary keywords while keeping readable
Complete ALL attribute fields for every listing
Add clear return policy to every listing
Optimize first thumbnail for mobile feed display
Track and improve conversion rate to 3%+ minimum
Build consistent positive reviews through excellent service
Use lifestyle photos showing product in context
criticalDonts: Don't use text overlays or collages in listing images
Don't keyword stuff titles/descriptions - algorithm penalizes this
Don't ignore message response time - under 24hrs is critical
Don't renew listings frequently just for boost - hurts more than helps
Don't use identical keywords across all listings
Don't charge over $6 shipping for US domestic (if US seller)
Don't ship late or miss processing time estimates
Don't rely on old SEO tactics - 2025 is behavior-driven

details: Thumbnails must work at small sizes in feed
First image often only chance to capture attention
Algorithm tracks clicks, favorites, add-to-cart, dwell time
Machine learning ranks based on individual buyer history
Overall shop performance affects all listings
No text overlays (harder to read on mobile, penalized)
Each sale signals relevance for that keyword

steps: Place primary keyword in first 5 words
Add buyer intent phrase (gift for, personalized, custom)
Include 2-3 descriptive modifiers (style, material, use case)

example: baby gift for mom to be

structure: HOOK (First 160 chars): Include primary keyword, state benefit, create desire
BENEFITS: What problem solved, how it improves life, what makes it special
SPECIFICATIONS: Dimensions, materials, what's included, format
USAGE/CARE: How to use/display, care instructions
SHIPPING/POLICIES: Processing time, shipping details, return policy

criticalChecks: Text overlays or collages? (PROHIBITED - instant penalty)
Mobile thumbnail effectiveness: Would this catch attention at small size?
Lifestyle context vs plain product shot

beSpecific.good: Your title should move 'personalized' to the first 5 words to capture gift shoppers. Try: 'Personalized Leather Journal | Custom...' instead of 'Leather Journal Personalized Custom...'

provideContext: Compare to competitor averages when relevant
Show how changes affect ranking factors
prioritizeClearly: Give quick wins vs long-term improvements
Show expected ROI for each recommendation
